Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.user_interface.gui

Class ModeChoiceScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.client.user_interface.gui.ModeChoiceScreen
  • public class ModeChoiceScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    It represents the screen in which to choose the mode of a weapon
